Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SFK2 (synthetic AMPs, conjugated peptide: staph-targeting sequence + temporin-SHf + KK, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (40%) toTemporin-SHfF: 20%, G=S: 15%, K=R: 10%.Activity: Active against S. aureus 1882 or 6538 (MIC 2 uM), S-epidermidis 12228 (MIC > 64 uM), E-coli 25922 or K88 or K99 (MIC > 64 uM), P-aeruginosa 27853 or 15442 (MIC > 64 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Wang T, Tan P, Tang Q, Zhou C, Ding Y, Xu S, Song M, Fu H, Zhang Y, Zhang X, Bai Y, Sun Z, Ma X. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Phage-displayed heptapeptide sequence conjugation significantly improves the specific targeting ability of antimicrobial peptides against Staphylococcus aureus.
